text: "Miami, My Amy" is a song written by Dean Dillon, Hank Cochran and Royce Porter, and recorded by American country music artist Keith Whitley. It was released in January 1986 as the second single from the album L.A. to Miami. The song reached number 14 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. ==Chart performance== "Miami, My Amy" debuted at number 68 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks for the week of February 8, 1986. {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1986) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|38 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 singles Category:Keith Whitley songs Category:Songs written by Hank Cochran Category:Songs written by Dean Dillon Category:RCA Records singles Category:Songs written by Royce Porter Category:1985 songs
title: Miami, My Amy
